scripts.dev: npm run clear && npm run set-pkg-dev && nodemon --exec cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node -- src/index.ts
scripts.start-dev: npm run set-pkg-start && NODE_ENV=development node build/src/index.js
scripts.pm2-start: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then npm run pm2-stop && npm run pm2-delete && npm run pm2-start ; else npm run set-pkg-start && pm2 start build/src/index.js --name "eodiro-api2" ; fi
scripts.pm2-restart: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then pm2 restart eodiro-api2 ; else echo 'No PM2 instance for eodiro API 2' ; fi
scripts.pm2-stop: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then pm2 stop eodiro-api2 ; else echo 'No PM2 instance for eodiro API 2' ; fi
scripts.pm2-delete: if pm2 show eodiro-api2 ; then pm2 delete eodiro-api2 ; else echo 'No PM2 instance for eodiro API 2' ; fi
scripts.pm2-reboot: npm run pm2-stop && npm run pm2-delete && npm run build && npm run pm2-start
scripts.dev-legacy: npm run clear && nodemon -e ts --exec "npm run compile"
scripts.deploy: git reset --hard && git fetch --prune && git checkout v$npm_package_version && npm install && npm run pm2-reboot
